channel.title: Object-Oriented Paradigm on Mohamed Adel
channel.description: Recent content in Object-Oriented Paradigm on Mohamed Adel

item.title: Game Engine
item.description: Table of Contents Link to heading Summary Summary Link to heading Implemented six distinct games, namely Tic-Tac-Toe, Connect-4, Checkers, Chess, 8-Queens, and Sudoku. Try the Demo Accomplished a substantial practical project in adherence to the Object-Oriented paradigm, centering on the implementation of abstraction concepts within the context of board games
